sourcesContent:
import React from "react" function Aboutme () { return (

ABOUT ME

Who am I?

My name is Alexander Conor Waite, I live in South Australia in the suburb of Unley. I was born and grew up in Mount Barker in the Adelaide Hills

What are your hobbies?

In my spare time I like to play video games with my friends, currently my favourite game is Apex Legends. I also enjoy spending time expressing my creativity by designing new outfits or drawing pictures. I am an extroverted person so I like going to social events and find I can have fun doing pretty much anything aslong as I have friends with me.

What do you do?

Currently I am doing a coding boot camp at the University of Adelaide. I do not have a job right now however I hope that at the end of this coding boot camp I will have all the skills and employability I need to become a juinior developer for a tech company.

) } export default Aboutme
